title: Chem Eng Thermodynamics
description: Principles of thermodynamics, including: first and second laws; equations of state; PVT properties; power cycles and refrigeration; phase equilibria; fugacity and activity coefficients; multi-reaction equilibrium.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CHBE 2100 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and (BIOL 1510 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ((BIOS 1107 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 1207 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (BIOS 1107L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 1207L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)))
